services.title: SARS-CoV2 (COVID-19) testing
services.detail: We offer SARS-CoV2 (COVID-19) testing and complete laboratory services. RT-PCR based COVID-19 test for travelers & patients Results delivered within: 4 hrs. and 12 hrs.

services.title: DOWN SYNDROME
services.detail: DOWN SYNDROME is a condition in which extra genetic material causes delays in the way a child develops, both physically and mentally

services.title: MODY
services.detail: MODY is a rare form of diabetes which is different from both Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes, and runs strongly in families.

services.title: BIRTH DEFECTS
services.detail: BIRTH DEFECTS are problems that some babies have while they are still in the womb. These defects may affect how their organs develop and perform.

services.title: HEREDITARY CANCER
services.detail: CANCER cases occur in someone who inherited a genetic mutation that increases cancer risk.

services.title: Prenatal and Postnatal diagnosis
services.detail: Prenatal genetic diagnosis is meant to detect chromosomal abnormalities before birth.

services.title: Hematologic malignancies
services.detail: These are cancers that affect the blood and lymph. Blood cancer begins in the cells of blood forming tissue or cells of the immune system.

services.title: Tumor characterization
services.detail: These are cancers that affect the blood and lymph. Blood cancer begins in the cells of blood forming tissue or cells of the immune system.
